youtubeUrl.title: YouTube Video URL
youtubeUrl.description: YouTube video URL to extract audio from (e.g., https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=dQw4w9WgXcQ)

r2BucketName.title: R2 Bucket Name
r2BucketName.description: Cloudflare R2 bucket name to upload audio files (optional - if provided, audio will be uploaded)

r2AccountId.title: R2 Account ID
r2AccountId.description: Cloudflare R2 Account ID (required for R2 upload)

r2AccessKeyId.title: R2 Access Key ID
r2AccessKeyId.description: Cloudflare R2 Access Key ID (required for R2 upload)

r2SecretAccessKey.title: R2 Secret Access Key
r2SecretAccessKey.description: Cloudflare R2 Secret Access Key (required for R2 upload)

proxyUrl.title: Generic Proxy URL
proxyUrl.description: Any URL to proxy through with IP rotation (e.g., https://httpbin.org/ip)

useResidentialProxy.title: Use Residential Proxy
useResidentialProxy.description: Use residential IPs for better stealth (recommended for YouTube)

countryCode.title: Proxy Country Code
countryCode.description: Country code for proxy (US, GB, CA, AU, DE, etc.)

maxRetries.title: Maximum Retries
maxRetries.description: Maximum number of extraction attempts with different IPs
